name: GivingX – Fundraising Platform | CRM, Integrations, Apple Pay
author: GivingX

sections.description:
Enhance your fundraising initiatives with the GivingX plugin, tailored for non-profits, charities, and community groups. This powerful plugin integrates directly with your GivingX account, enabling you to manage donation forms, buttons, and track donation analytics directly from your WordPress site.

External Service Notice:
This plugin relies on the GivingX platform, an external service provided by GivingX. A GivingX account is required to use this plugin, and significant functionality (such as donation form management, analytics, and third-party integrations) is dependent on the GivingX API. Please be aware that data is transmitted between your WordPress site and the GivingX servers to provide these features.

For more information, please refer to the following:
– GivingX Service
– Privacy Policy
– Terms of Service

Short Description

Easily manage fundraising with Giving for WordPress. Add donation forms, buttons, and track your results right from your WordPress site.

Key Features

  • Donor CRM: Manage donor information seamlessly to foster lasting relationships.
  • Fundraising Forms: Users can fetch and display user-created forms directly from their GivingX account. Forms management (create, update, delete) is handled via the GivingX platform.
  • Donation Buttons: Easily integrate one-click donation buttons into your website using shortcodes.
  • Analytics Dashboard: View comprehensive analytics on your donations, including lists of recurring and one-time donations.
  • Third-Party Integration Status: Check the connection status of integrations like Facebook Pixel, LinkedIn, Google Analytics, Apple Pay, and Stripe. Note: Connections are managed through the GivingX platform.
  • Donation Records: Access detailed records for all types of donations.
  • 24/7 Support: Available via GivingX Chat Bot and email to assist with any issues.

External Dependencies

This plugin relies on external services provided by GivingX. Use of this plugin requires a GivingX account, and significant functionality is dependent on the GivingX API. Please review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to understand how data is handled and the terms of use.

Usage

  • Adding Donation Forms: Navigate to the GivingX plugin section in your WordPress admin panel, log in with your GivingX account, and select the forms to display.
  • Using Shortcodes: Use provided shortcodes to embed donation buttons anywhere on your site.
  • Viewing Analytics: Access the analytics dashboard directly from the plugin’s homepage in your admin panel.

Support

For support queries, visit our Contact Page or reach out directly via email at support@givingx.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the givingx folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the plugin by logging in with your GivingX account to fetch and display donation forms and analytics.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0: • First release of the plugin. Ensure to review the integration and connection statuses via the plugin dashboard.
